name: Bunker (Ilex Games, Marcelo Rigon, lucasdias)
description:
This is a Global Game Jam '15 game.

You wake up alone in a prison cell holding only to your fear.
Will they kill and torture you? 
Who are you? 
Why are you in a prison cell? 
What will you do now? 
Try to leave the cell and found out if it was really a clever idea.

Credits:

  •  Marcelo Rigon - Game designer and Lead programmer
  • Lucas Dias - Programmer
  • Mariana Zancheta - Artist
  • Alessandra Nishimoto - Artist
  • Mirella Brolezi - Artist
  • Bruno Gazzoni - Music/SFX
